title: Sticky wages cause unemployment when AD falls

content.question: Following a decrease in aggregate demand, an increase in unemployment will result if

choices.label: prices increase and real wages decrease
the aggregate supply curve is vertical
prices and wages quickly adjust to equilibrium levels
prices and nominal wages are slow to adjust in the short run

content.answer: prices and nominal wages are slow to adjust in the short run

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run
